Summary: right before a thunderstorm orbs appeared,they seemed intelligent sort of checking me out.
divs: Sighting Detailsit was around 3am late july 1994. i woke up to the sound of thunder from a distance. i went to my bedroom window to take a look,the lightning was lighting up my whole yard. i was living on top of read mountain in roanoke va. and we would get real bad thunderstorms but this one was different it seemed there was more lightning with this storm. as i was looking out my window i caught a glimpse of a light streaking threw the right of my yard, i turned my head to see what it was, i caught the back end of it just for a second before it went into some trees. i walked out on my pourch to look around. as i walked outside the air seemed to be thinner and had a static feel to it. also the temperature was dropping because it felt real cool, but when the wind blew the air was almost hot, it was realy strange. i was looking over at the trees were i had lost sight of the light when i was looking out my bedroom window. about a minute passed and i observed the light coming out of the tree line back towards the house it had a brilliant white light that was at that time pulsing slowly, it looked like it was coming right up to the pourch and i got a rush over my whole body it was like a very intense excited feeling that i felt i wasnt going to be able to control and it was getting worse as it got closer. then it suddenly stopped about 10 to 15 feet in front of the pourch, about 15 to 20 feet from me. it hovered for a couple of minutes. i had no idea what i was looking at. to the best of my knowledge it was nothing i have ever heard of. i stepped to the left towards my front door and it moved to its right to stay in front of me so i just froze there, as i was standing there it moved right towards me getting about a foot from me it moved around me in a 360 degree circle keeping the same distanced away from me. it made two more circles around me and hovered in front of me for about 25 or 30 seconds, i raised my arm up from my side slowly as to reach out and touch it and it immediatly backed up in straight line about ten feet and started pulsating at a very rapid speed, about 10 seconds later it shot straight up into the sky and it started to rain so hard, i opened the front door to go back inside as i intered the house i bumped into my brother in the dark, he was in a state of shock so to speak he had wittnessed the entire event. we both had that intense excited feeling for about 72 hours afterwards. i have wittnessed these orbs on several different occasions. has anyone out there experienced this or something close to it?
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
